label: Async Generators
approach: Use async generator functions (async function*) for paginate and asyncMap. The yield keyword naturally makes iteration lazy — pages aren't fetched until the consumer asks for the next item.
steps: paginate: Loop while there's a cursor. Fetch a page, yield each item, then advance the cursor.
collect: Use for-await-of to drain an async iterable into an array.
asyncMap: for-await over the input, apply the transform fn, yield the result.
Laziness is automatic — the generator pauses at each yield until .next() is called.
